title: Eurovision 2024 -Αποκάλυψη από το παρελθόν: Τι σχέση έχει η Ισραηλινή τραγουδίστρια με τη Ρωσία
cleaned_sentences: Eurovision 2024 -Revelation from the past: What does Israeli singer have to do with Russia Israeli spokesman at Eurovision 2024 had competed in the TV show "Voice of Russia" A largely unknown story from the recent past has come to light about Israel's finalist in Eurovision, Eden Golan.
According to a video widely released on social media, the Israeli singer had attempted to 'conquer' the Russian audience six years ago.
A video of her performance on the "Voice of Russia" television show appeared on the internet.
Golan has Ukrainian roots on her mother's side, but she lived almost her entire life in Moscow.
In 2016, Golan appeared at the New Wave competition in Crimea as a duet with Russian singer Nyusha.
In 2022, after the start of the war in Ukraine, Golan and her family moved to Israel.
